questions.questionText: Pointing to a woman, Arjun said, "She is the daughter of my grandfather's only child." How is the woman related to Arjun?
questions.explanation: My grandfather's only child = My father (or mother). Daughter of my father = My sister. So the woman is Arjun's sister.

questions.questionText: M is the son of P. Q is the granddaughter of P. R is the daughter of M. How is R related to Q?
questions.explanation: P is the parent. M is P's son (so M is Q's parent or uncle). Q is P's granddaughter. R is M's daughter (so R is also P's granddaughter). Since both Q and R are granddaughters of P through M, R and Q are sisters.

questions.questionText: A is the father of B. C is the sister of B. D is the brother of A. E is the daughter of D. How is E related to C?
questions.explanation: A is B's father and C's father (C is B's sister). D is A's brother (so D is B and C's uncle). E is D's daughter (so E is cousin to B and C). Therefore, E is C's cousin.

questions.questionText: If P + Q means P is the brother of Q, P × Q means P is the father of Q, P - Q means P is the sister of Q, which of the following means R is the uncle of S?
questions.explanation: For R to be uncle of S, R must be the brother of one of S's parents. R + T × S means R is the brother of T, and T is the father of S. This makes R the uncle of S.
